value.title: India FinTech Forum Unveils 28 high potential fintech startups for IFTA 2021
value.excerpt: India FinTech Forum, a not for profit fintech advocacy group representing Indian fintech companies, has announced 28 fintech startups who will be showcasing their product demos to a high-profile jury from 23 rd  November – 25 th  November 2021 to compete for the Fintech Startup of the Year trophy at the 6 th  edition of India FinTech Awards (IFTA).
